actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend title XII of the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to provide that each foreign air carrier shall maintain and administer security measures with respect to foreign air transportation equal to security measures applicable to air carriers operating in interstate air transportation.

summary.text: Provides that each foreign air carrier shall maintain and administer security measures with respect to foreign air transportation, for flights destined for the United States, equal to security measures applicable to air carriers operating in interstate air transportation, subject to a revocation of opeating authority of such carrier.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XII of the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to provide that each foreign air carrier shall maintain and administer security measures with respect to foreign air transportation equal to security measures applicable to air carriers operating in interstate air transportation.
